experiments.name: DIVMosaics
experiments.long_description:
Displays images in a mosaic effect using multiple DIV's as the mosaic tiles. Each mosaic tile is animated using transtions on the top and left properties.

The mosaic effect shows Servo's ability to deal with many DOM elements aswell as their transitions. The transitions in particular perform very well in Servo thanks to the hardware acceleration provided by Servo's rendering engine, WebRender.

experiments.name: Mosaic Gallery
experiments.long_description: A gallery of generated DIV mosaics. Here, the DIV tiles representing each pixel are positioned statically and have transitions on their background colour property.
